short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily search multiple online stores at the same time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shop Search is a simple tool for searching multiple online stores at the same time. Just select the stores you want to search, type in a search term, and get instant results across all selected sites in new tabs. Over 60 stores are included and you can customize them by adding only the stores and categories you want.

Use Shop Search to compare prices, find the best deals cross-reference products, and save time effortlessly.
